mapper.insert: insert into tbl_schedule(scdno, fk_scdno2, fk_mbr_seq, scdsubject, scdstartdate, scdenddate, attendance) values(schedule_seq.nextval, #{fk_scdno2}, #{fk_mbr_seq}, #{scdsubject}, to_date(#{scdstartdate} || ' ' || #{scdstartTm}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), to_date(#{scdenddate} || ' ' || #{scdendTm},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi'), #{attendance})
insert into tbl_mtrhistory(usemtrno, fk_scdno, fk_mtrno, regDate, starttime, endtime) values(mtrhistory_seq.nextval, #{fk_scdno}, #{fk_mtrno}, #{regDate}, #{starttime}, #{endtime})
